name: Fearless Racer
description:
Simple mobile endless runner game. You have to compete with yourself and be better every time you start. What is your best score?

Uploading this game here because I need to know opinions of other people. Do you think that I should continue and update this game with store, skins, leaderboards and more? If yes, please let me know in comments.

Also every single donation will be appreciated and help me with developing future games.
